Invocation for someone who gives you dri.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ أَطْعِمْ مَنْ أَطْعَمَنِي، وَاسْقِ مَنْ سَقَانِي)).
Invocation for someone who gives you dri.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma atAAim man atAAamanee wasqi man saqanee.)
Invocation for someone who gives you dri.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, feed him who fed me, and provide with drink him who provided me with drink.)
